Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.config

Services for configuring ViewShell components and plug-in components.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConfigResource
    Represents persistent configuration resource types other than default configuration stores.
    IConfigResourceEventContext
    Configuration resource event context for external changes.
    IConfigResourceEventListener
    Listener for configuration resource events.
    IConfigService
    Gets the configuration service for the ViewShell environment.
    IConfigServiceEventContext
    Configuration service event context.
    IConfigServiceEventListener
    Listener interface for receiving notification of configuration service events, such as persistent configuration store availability.
    IConfigStore
    Manages read/write configuration properties and provides support for persistent storage.
    IConfigStoreEventContext
    Configuration store event context.
    IConfigStoreEventListener
    Listener interface for receiving notification of external changes to configuration stores.
    IConfigUnit
    Manages read/write configuration properties, providing convenience methods for strings, integers, booleans, UUIDs, binary data, and sequences of values with the same base name.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ResourceType
    Defines configuration resource types other than the default non-hierarchical XML properties format.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigException
    Describes configuration problems for an application

Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.config Description

Services for configuring ViewShell components and plug-in components.

The main features of this package are available through IConfigService (itself available via the OSGi Service Registry):

  • Access to logging facilities for system components, web server components, and user plug-in components.
  • Access to server configuration, including endpoint URL, and session cookie options.
Since:
1.0
